description: Product of first n composite numbers minus 1 is a prime.
mathematica: Composite[ n_Integer ] := (k = n + PrimePi[ n ] + 1; While[ k - PrimePi[ k ] - 1 != n, k++ ]; k); Do[ m = n; If[ PrimeQ[ Product[ Composite[ k ], {k, 1, n} ] - 1 ], Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 1980} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 21 2001
